full_summary:
## Tender Announcement for Procurement of Office Furniture

- **Solicitation Number**: WS3754817841
- **Reference Number**: EF245-231427-2
- **Publication Date**: January 4, 2023

### Important Details
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
- **Contract Value**: To be determined through the bidding process
- **Region of Delivery**: Montréal, Québec, Canada

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** for the procurement of office furniture category 1, 2, and 5, under contract E60PQ-140003. Interested suppliers are required to submit their proposals as per the requirements specified in the solicitation documents.

### Key Bid Dates
- **Contact Debriefing Session**: To be arranged after the tender closing date
- **Bid Submission Deadline**: January 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

### Instructions to Bidders

- **Proposal Submission**: Provide a detailed proposal outlining the proposed goods and services as per the requirements specified in the solicitation documents
- **Bid Submission Requirements**: Submit all required documentation and bid before the specified deadline

### Contract and Trade
- **Contract Value**: Awarded contract value will be contingent on the procurement method selected
- **Trade Agreement**: Compliant with the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

### Tender Documentation

For more detailed information and to access the solicitation documents, please refer to the pane containing "How to bid on this contract". Further questions may be directed to Lisa-Marie Julien at **lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.

End-of-entry
==========


### Status Update

The original RFP EF245-231427 dated December 2, 2022, has been cancelled and replaced with this RFP. Interested suppliers who submitted bids under the previous RFP may request a debriefing or feedback session upon submission of their bid under this RFP.letion Criterion
1.  Lowest Price

ignoring Trade Agreements:

A **Commercial Offer** can be submitted provided the bid incorporates the key elements declared in the Service Regulations. [SOL]

Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
